name: Borg Backup ID
description: What is the Borg backup ID? Collect the Borg backup ID from either the backup server or AWX's 'Backup AWX [List Backups]' template. For example: awx-2022-12-27T03:02:08

spec.question_description: What is the Borg backup ID? Collect the Borg backup ID from either the backup server or AWX's 'Backup AWX [List Backups]' template. For example: awx-2022-12-27T03:02:08

What is the AWX backup directory? Collect the local tower-openshift-backup directory name from either the above script, the server itself, or AWX's 'Backup AWX [List Backups]' template. For example: tower-openshift-backup-2022-12-24-11:43:33
